translation.en: Witcher.
[Triss] You say this is all life is to you.
translation.es: Dices que esto es la vida para ti.

translation.en: Monsters and money.
I feel something out there waits for you.
Something more.
How much for this beast?
[man] Four marks.
Let me out!
Magic is organizing Chaos.
translation.es: La magia va organizando el Caos.

translation.en: Without control…
Your hand!
[Tissaia] …Chaos will kill you.
[Tissaia] Demonstrated beautifully. Thank you, Fringilla.
There are mages who ignore their emotions…
translation.es: Hay magas que ignoran sus emociones

translation.en: -[yells] -…and then there are mages who are consumed by them.
translation.es: y hay magas consumidas por las emociones.

translation.en: It is your job to control Chaos, -not become it. -[screams]
translation.es: Es tu trabajo controlar el Caos,no convertirte en él.

translation.en: -What's your name? -Istredd.
You can trust me.
What do you want?
I want to be powerful.
[Giltine] There is a cost to all creation.
translation.es: Hay un costo para toda creación.

translation.en: To be reborn,
you will bear no more.
I know who you are. You're a monster hunter.
translation.es: Ya sé quién eres.Eres un cazador de monstruos.

translation.en: White hair, big old loner…
-We don't want your kind here, Witcher. -You mutant son of a bitch.
translation.es: - No eres bienvenido aquí, brujo.- Mutante hijo de puta.

translation.en: You're the witcher, Geralt of Rivia.
translation.es: Eres el brujo, Geralt de Rivia.

translation.en: A job, I've got for you.
-[Geralt] Evil is evil. -[blade swooshes]
Lesser, greater, middling,
it's all the same.
What if they come after you?
Why not kill them?
Because then, I am what they say I am.
translation.es: Porque, entonces,sería lo que dicen que soy.

translation.en: [Jaskier] The Butcher of Blaviken!
The girl in the woods is your destiny.
translation.es: La chica del bosque es tu destino.

translation.en: [Jaskier] You have got a bit of an image problem.
[Geralt] Go away.
[Jaskier] I won't be but silent backup.
Oh my God.
[Istredd] Elves are the original sorcerers of the Continent.
translation.es: Los elfos fueronlos magos originales del Continente.

translation.en: Mages taught the first humans how to turn Chaos into magic.
translation.es: Y enseñaron a los humanosa convertir el Caos en magia.

translation.en: My elders were slaughtered.
I was once Filavandrel of the Silver Towers.
translation.es: Una vez fuiFilavandrel de la Torre de Plata.

translation.en: Show the humans
that you are more than what they fear you to be.
translation.es: que son más de lo que temen que sean.

translation.en: [Geralt] This is where we part ways, Bard.
[Jaskier] I promised to change the public's tune about you.
translation.es: Prometí cambiar la opinión pública de ti.

translation.en: -At least allow me to try. -[strums lute]
♪ Toss a coin to your witcher ♪
♪ O, Valley of Plenty ♪
[crowd joins in] ♪ Toss a coin to your witcher ♪
♪ A friend of humanity ♪ Ah, thank you!
I've made you famous, Witcher.
All I'm asking for is one night bodyguarding your best friend in the whole world.
translation.es: Solo te pido que escoltesa tu mejor amigo del mundo una noche.

translation.en: I'm not your friend.
[page] All rise for Her Majesty, Queen Calanthe of Cintra!
translation.es: ¡Todos de pie para su majestad,la reina Calanthe de Cintra!

translation.en: Can't have anyone finding out who you are.
translation.es: - No deben saber quién eres.- ¡Geralt de Rivia, el poderoso brujo!

translation.en: -Geralt of Rivia, the mighty witcher! -[Jaskier] Oh, shit.
translation.es: - No deben saber quién eres.- ¡Geralt de Rivia, el poderoso brujo! Mierda.

translation.en: [Calanthe] Come, Witcher. Take a seat by my side.
translation.es: Ven, brujo. Siéntate a mi lado.

translation.en: [Mousesack] These suitors will vie all night for Princess Pavetta's hand.
translation.es: Los pretendientes competirán toda la nochepor la mano de la princesa Pavetta.

translation.en: I've come to claim your daughter's hand in marriage. -No! -[guests exclaiming]
translation.es: Vine a pedirla mano de su hija en matrimonio. ¡No!

translation.en: [Duny] I come to claim Pavetta,
by the Law of Surprise.
translation.es: por el Derecho de la Sorpresa.

translation.en: I saved your husband, King Roegner,
translation.es: Salvé a su esposo, el rey Roegner,

translation.en: from a certain death.
I chose the Law of Surprise as payment.
translation.es: Elegí el Derecho de la Sorpresa como pago.

translation.en: Slay this beast!
[Eist] The Law of Surprise is as old as mankind itself.
translation.es: El Derecho de la Sorpresaes tan antiguo como la humanidad.

translation.en: [Mousesack] When one has saved another from certain death…
translation.es: Si salvas a alguien de una muerte segura…

translation.en: -No! -[roars]
…the Law of Surprise can be claimed to pay that debt.
translation.es: …puedes apelar al Derecho de la Sorpresapara pagar esa deuda.

translation.en: [Eist] Destiny determines the surprise.
[Mousesack] Your blessing of this marriage has fulfilled a destiny.
translation.es: Al bendecir este matrimonio,hiciste realidad el destino.

translation.en: You saved my life. I must repay you.
translation.es: Me salvaste la vida. Debo pagarte.

translation.en: I claim the tradition as you have. The Law of Surprise.
translation.es: Recurro a la tradición como tú,al Derecho de la Sorpresa.

translation.en: What have you done, Witcher?
Destiny can go f--
translation.es: El destino se puede ir a la…

translation.en: Fuck.
You're bound to this child whether you like it or not.
translation.es: Estás atado a este bebé, te guste o no.

translation.en: I'm getting out of here. Alone.
Hello. What's it been, years?
-What are you fishing for, exactly? -A djinn. I can't sleep.
translation.es: - ¿Qué intentas pescar?- Un djinn. No puedo dormir.

translation.en: Just maybe this has got something to do with the Law of Surprise, destiny.
translation.es: Quizá esto esté relacionadocon el Derecho de la Sorpresa, el destino.

translation.en: Being unable to escape the child that belongs to you.
-Jaskier? -[coughs]
[Chireadan] But he needs a magical remedy.
-[Geralt] You must be the mage. -[Yennefer] Yennefer of Vengerberg.
translation.es: - Debes ser la hechicera.- Yennefer de Vengerberg.

translation.en: [Geralt] He was attacked by a djinn. -Fix it. -[Yennefer] A djinn?
translation.es: - Lo atacó un djinn. Cúralo.- ¿Un djinn?

translation.en: -Do you doubt my capabilities? -No. Just your intentions.
translation.es: - ¿Dudas de mis habilidades?- No. Solo de tus intenciones.

translation.en: She wants to be the vessel.
-Dont! -You seem to want to meet your end.
As do you.
[voices overlapping] Make your wish.
You can have anything you want.
I wish…
[Jaskier] Oh, they're alive.
They're really alive!
[Geralt] The moment I dread most
translation.es: El momento que más miedo me da

translation.en: is when it fades.
When you're really gone.
translation.es: Cuando ya no queda nada de ti.

translation.en: [Yennefer] You left first.
I woke up in that destroyed house, and you were gone.
translation.es: Desperté en esa casa destruida y tú ya no estabas.

translation.en: A short while ago, a green dragon landed across the border
translation.es: Hace poco, un dragón verdecruzó la frontera y llegó a las montañas del rey Niedamir.

translation.en: in King Niedamir's mountains.
translation.es: y llegó a las montañas del rey Niedamir.

translation.en: He's commissioned a hunt to kill it.
[Jaskier] We really can't get involved.
-I'm in. -Mother of…
[Yennefer] I've walked this earth for decades
without coming across a witcher,
and then the first one I meet, I can't get rid of.
translation.es: pero conozco a unoy no logro librarme de él.

translation.en: -What are you doing here, Yen? -I'm here for the dragon.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces aquí, Yen?- Vine por el dragón.

translation.en: Do not tell me you've traveled all this way
translation.es: No me digas que viajaste hasta aquí

translation.en: for made-up fertility cures using fresh dragon hearts.
translation.es: por el cuento de que el corazón de dragóncura la fertilidad.

translation.en: -They're not made-up. -They are.
-What could you want with a child? -[Yennefer] They took my choice.
translation.es: - ¿Para qué querrías un niño?- Me quitaron la posibilidad.

translation.en: -I want it back. -[screaming]
[Geralt] The dwarves, they're leading us to a shorter path.
translation.es: Los enanos nos guiarán por un atajo.

translation.en: Nilfgaard has returned burning through the south. [Yennefer] With Fringilla as their mage.
translation.es: - Nilfgaard volvió veloz por el sur.- Con Fringilla como su maga.

translation.en: [Fringilla] Cahir, we must move.
They're inching closer by the day.
Won't be long till they try and take Cintra.
translation.es: No tardarán en intentar tomar Cintra.

translation.en: [Geralt] Come with me.
[Yennefer] I can take care of myself. [Geralt] You don't always have to.
translation.es: - Puedo cuidarme sola.- No siempre tienes por qué.

translation.en: [Yennefer] I was afraid that mountain would take you from me.
translation.es: Temía que la montaña te llevara.

translation.en: -I'm not leaving till I kill that dragon. -Yen…
translation.es: - No me iré hasta matar a ese dragón.- Yen…

translation.en: -What will it solve? -[Yennefer] Everything.
She was protecting her baby. Now!
[Geralt] Did you always want to become a mother?
I dreamed of becoming important to someone.
translation.es: Soñaba con ser importante para alguien.

translation.en: [Geralt] You're important to me.
-The djinn. -That's why we can't escape each other.
translation.es: - El djinn.- Por eso no me libro de ti.

translation.en: You made a wish.
-It's magic. -[Geralt] It's real, Yen.
[Yennefer] How could we ever know?
I made that wish to save your life.
I didn't need your help!
A child is no way to boost your fragile ego, Yen.
translation.es: Un niño no mejorarátu ego de cristal, Yen.

translation.en: I'll take advice from you about children as soon as you take responsibility
for the one you bound to you and then abandoned!
translation.es: por el niño que uniste a ti y abandonaste.

translation.en: [Borch] The sorceress will never regain her womb.
translation.es: La hechicera nunca recuperará su útero.

translation.en: And though you didn't want to lose her, Geralt, you will.
translation.es: Y aunque no querías perderla,Geralt, la perderás.

translation.en: He already has.
[Geralt] You wanted to show me what I was missing. There she goes.
translation.es: Querías mostrarmelo que me faltaba. Ahí va.

translation.en: -Whew! What a day. -Damn it, Jaskier!
If life could give me one blessing,
translation.es: Si la vida me concediera un milagro,

translation.en: it would be to take you off my hands!
Right, then.
See you around, Geralt.
You've come for your Child of Surprise.
translation.es: Viniste por tu Niño de la Sorpresa.

translation.en: Princess Cirilla has been raised by Calanthe since her parents died.
translation.es: Calanthe crio a la princesa Cirilladesde que murieron sus padres.

translation.en: Pavetta and Duny's ship was lost at sea.
translation.es: La nave de Pavetta y Dunyse perdió en el mar.

translation.en: Have you been hiding your head in the sand?
translation.es: ¿Acaso anduvistecon la cabeza metida en la arena?

translation.en: Why do you think she's not safe?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que no está a salvo?

translation.en: [Geralt] I saw an army. A sea of black and gold.
translation.es: Vi un ejército. Un mar negro y dorado.

translation.en: [Calanthe] Why would I give my only heir to someone who never cared enough to come back for her?
translation.es: ¿Por qué darle mi única herederaa alguien que nunca regresó por ella?

translation.en: Maybe that army won't come, and if they do, maybe you'll be ready.
translation.es: Quizá ese ejército no venga,y, si viene, quizá estén listos,

translation.en: But I'm here to protect the girl.
translation.es: pero estoy aquí para proteger a la chica.

translation.en: [Calanthe] Get him out of my sight.
The Nilfgaardian force crossed the Amell Pass.
translation.es: La fuerza nilfgaardianacruzó el Paso de Amell.

translation.en: Should we fall, your granddaughter will rule.
[Calanthe] They're already here.
-[man 1] Should be here! -[man 2] Find it immediately!
Hello, Yennefer.
[Yennefer] How long do you see yourself here?
Because I may be missing you. I'm sorry you chose power.
translation.es: - Porque quizá te extrañé.- Lamento que eligieras el poder.

translation.en: His loss.
-Piss off. -I would, but we don't have much time.
translation.es: - Lárgate.- Me iría, pero no tenemos mucho tiempo.

translation.en: Tissaia asked for me?
She said you're the best student she ever taught.
translation.es: Dijo que eres la mejor alumna que tuvo.

translation.en: [Yennefer] Why are you all here?
An emergency conclave of the Northern mages. Nilfgaard took Marnadal.
translation.es: Hay un cónclave de emergencia.Nilfgaard invadió Marnadal.

translation.en: [Triss] They're attacking Cintra.
We can stop Nilfgaard, if we act now.
translation.es: Podemos detener a Nilfgaard, si actuamos ahora.

translation.en: [Stregobor] Cintra's a lost cause. Let them reap what they sow.
translation.es: Cintra es una causa perdida.Que cosechen lo que siembran.

translation.en: Vilgefortz and I and some others are going to fight.
translation.es: Con Vilgefortz y otros más,vamos a pelear.

translation.en: You should join us.
The witcher…
If I can bring him here…
-Geralt! -…to Ciri, destiny may yet side with us.
translation.es: Si logro traerlo aquí… ¡Geralt! …con Ciri, quizás el destinose ponga de nuestro lado.

translation.en: -[Mousesack] He's gone. -[Lazlo] We must go, Highness.
translation.es: Se fue. - Debemos irnos, su alteza.- ¡No!

translation.en: -[screaming] No! -[rumbling]
Find Geralt of Rivia.
He is your destiny.
[Guard] Hey!
Go.
-[Ciri] Why is Nilfgaard here? -[Lazlo grunts]
[Cahir] Do not--
No! No! No!
[man] Princess Cirilla!
[Ciri] You're an elf.
-I'm Dara. -I'm Ciri.
-[soldier] Come on. Get moving! -[yelps]
[Fringilla] We will find her. She is in Brokilon Forest.
translation.es: La encontraremos.Está en el Bosque de Brokilón.

translation.en: [soldier] Armies are not the way into Brokilon Forest.
translation.es: Un ejército no es lo mejorpara el Bosque de Brokilón.

translation.en: -[Ciri] Mousesack, he helped raise me. -[Mousesack] No!
[sobs] You don't know what she is.
[Cahir] Bring me the girl alive.
[Shan-Kayan] What are you, child?
Cintran refugees, dead at least a week.
translation.es: Refugiados de Cintra.Murieron hace una semana al menos.

translation.en: [Geralt] Come on, Roach. Back to Kaer Morhen.
translation.es: Vamos, Sardinilla. Volvamos a Kaer Morhen.

translation.en: [Yurga] Don't leave!
Fuck.
[Ciri] Mousesack!
[Dara] Something's off about this, Ciri.
My grandmother's sash.
-[Yennefer] We'll save the Continent? -[Triss] There are only 22 of us.
translation.es: - ¿Vamos a salvar al Continente?- Solo somos 22.

translation.en: There's only one way for Nilfgaard to move north, through Sodden Hill.
translation.es: Solo hay una forma de ir al norte:por el Monte de Sodden.

translation.en: They're two days away.
[Tissaia] We have sent word to the Northern Kingdoms to join us to defend their lands.
translation.es: Les pedimos a los reinos del norteque se unan para defender sus tierras.

translation.en: -[Yennefer] When is that? -[Vilgefortz] Within two days.
-I've had enough of you. -Mousesack, stop!
-[Dara] If I stay with you any longer… -Kill him.
translation.es: - Si sigo junto a ti…- Mátalo.

translation.en: …I'll be dead too.
I can't be there for you anymore.
Nilfgaard's looking for you.
No!
[voices overlapping] The Time of the White Chill and the White Light is nigh.
translation.es: Se acerca el Tiempodel Invierno Blanco y de la Luz Blanca.

translation.en: The Time of Madness
-and the Time of Contempt. -[screaming]
What happened?
[Ciri] They came for me.
[Zola] They got what they deserved.
We're safer when we stick together.
translation.es: Es más seguro si estamos juntos.

translation.en: They're here.
[Yurga] Careful, now. You got bit, Butcher.
[Sabrina] How is Nilfgaard's army here already?
translation.es: ¿Cómo ya llegó el ejército de Nilfgaard?

translation.en: [Yennefer] They're closing in.
[Vilgefortz] We can't wait for the Northern Kingdoms. We have to fight.
translation.es: No podemos esperar. Tenemos que pelear.

translation.en: Vilgefortz! Now! [echoing]
They've reached the gate.
-Triss! -[soldiers yelling]
-Shouldn't you be over-- -[Sabrina yells]
Help… me…
Vilgefortz…
How far from your home to the battlefield? To Sodden?
translation.es: ¿Qué tan lejos estáel campo de batalla? ¿Sodden?

translation.en: -Yennefer, to save these people… -[whimpers]
translation.es: Yennefer, para salvar a esta gente,a este continente,

translation.en: …this Continent, let your Chaos explode.
translation.es: Yennefer, para salvar a esta gente,a este continente, deja que tu caos explote.

translation.en: Yennefer?
Yennefer!
-Yennefer! -[Tissaia] Yennefer!
[Geralt] Yennefer!
People linked by destiny will always find each other.
translation.es: Las personas unidas por el destinosiempre se encuentran.

translation.en: Who is Yennefer?
